summary: This document is an email chain regarding contact from Scotland Yard about interviewing an Epstein victim, referencing a BBC story. It involves FBI personnel and mentions a prior interview.

persons.name: Public Affairs Specialist FBI New York
persons.context: The recipient or sender of an email regarding Scotland Yard's contact about an Epstein victim interview.

events.title: Scotland Yard Contact Regarding Epstein Victim Interview
events.description: Scotland Yard contacted someone about the protocol for interviewing an Epstein victim, referencing a BBC story described as more damning than a prior interview.

keyFacts: Scotland Yard contacted someone regarding the protocol for interviewing an Epstein victim.
A BBC story about the victim was referenced as being more damning than a prior interview.
The communication occurred via email on December 2, 2019, involving FBI personnel.
